body:
To add a data point to this. We now implement strided block overlap detection in github.com/gonum/matrix/mat64, [documentation here](https://github.com/gonum/matrix/commit/63ca8d2aafe3fb0cff6ceba412081418a686fa85) and detection [implementation here](https://github.com/gonum/matrix/commit/2340d863e8d0f0a36f5cda59912a92a77fb0fdd6). This is done essentially as described in the original discussion, both with unsafe for environments that allow that and via reflect for those that don't.

I don't see a constant time implementation that can be achieved without access to an offset call.
